title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 783/85 of 27 March 1985 fixing for the 1985 marketing year the reference prices for apricots
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 783/85
of 27 March 1985
fixing for the 1985 marketing year the reference prices for apricots
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1985 marketing year, the reference prices for apricots falling within subheading 08.07 A of the Common Customs Tariff, expressed in ECU per 100 kilograms net of packed products of class I, of all sizes, shall be as follows:
June (1 to 10): 103,30
(11 to 20): 90,01
(21 to 30): 79,82
July: 72,94

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 June 1985.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 March 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
